thread.title: Russian billionaire's £360 million superyacht is IMPOUNDED | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Russian billionaire's £360 million superyacht is IMPOUNDED | Daily Mail Online

author: Julian Robinson
title: Russian billionaire's £360 million superyacht is IMPOUNDED | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad BREAKING NEWS: Russian billionaire's £360 million superyacht is IMPOUNDED in Gibraltar because German shipbuilder says he is owed £13 million The £360 million sailing superyacht was soon due to be delivered to its owner after months of testing 468ft-long vessel was ordered by Andrey Igorevich Melnichenko who has an estimated net worth of £10.8bn It boasts three mammoth 300ft masts which stand taller than London's Big Ben and dwarf tankers in the sea But it has been impounded in Gibraltar after shipbuilder Nobiskrug said it was still owed more than £13million A spokesman for Mr Melnichenko is confident of a resolution claiming the issue was a 'a technical problem'
